meanings.definition: Make (an idea, situation, or problem) clear to someone by describing it in more detail.
meanings.sent1: Can you explain how to solve this math problem?
meanings.sent2: I will explain the rules of the game to you.
meanings.sent3: Let me explain why the chicken crossed the road.
meanings.sent4: She tried to explain the concept of time to her young child.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used diagrams to explain photosynthesis to the students.

meanings.definition: Give a reason or justification for (an action or event).
meanings.sent1: Please explain why you were late to class.
meanings.sent2: He had to explain his absence from the meeting.
meanings.sent3: I can't explain why the cat knocked over the vase.
meanings.sent4: The detective needed to explain the suspect's alibi.
meanings.sent5: She had to explain her decision to resign from her job.
